name: ADEX
description: Asynchronous Data Exchange (ADEX) hello is a centralised, self-service whole-of-government data exchange and event streaming platform with real-time, asynchronous, fire-and-forget data transfer that enables agencies to make better, real-time decisions based on up-to-date information.

documentations.name: ADEX User Guide
documentations.description: An onboarding and user guide to start using ADEX on the Internet

documentations.name: ADEX User Guide for Intranet
documentations.description: Information on using ADEX on the Intranet
